text: DON'T MISS 'This is so embarrassing!' Ferne McCann is left red-faced after suffering from bowel problems during double date with 'man of her dreams' on Celebs Go Dating Pregnant Amal Clooney outshines husband George as she displays her growing baby bump in sweeping ballgown at the Cesar Film Awards Blooming marvellous Jamie O'Hara fuels pregnancy rumours as he tweets about looking for a bigger car... after girlfriend Elizabeth Jayne Tierney hints they'll have a baby Khloe Kardashian and new boyfriend Tristan Thompson proudly show off their love (and amazing beach bodies!) on romantic getaway Wowzers! Sam Reece looks hunky for fashion launch in Liverpool... after slamming ex Stephanie Davis by questioning her 'loyalties' after reuniting with Jeremy McConnell When will Michelle be extradited for being a paedophile? And is Ian Beale pregnant? The week in Walford on EastEnders, by JIM SHELLEY Slimline Tina Malone flaunts svelte frame in tiger-print jumpsuit at fashion lunch in Liverpool... after dropping a huge NINE dress sizes 'I struggled with self doubt': Pregnant Cheryl reflects on her battle with self-esteem... as fans speculate whether she could ALREADY have given birth Chloe Madeley flaunts her incredible gym-honed figure and sculpted derriere in a silk bra and suspenders for steamy lingerie shoot Mum's the word for Victoria: Jenna Coleman portrays a 'working mother' in Christening scene as second series of ITV's hit royal drama begins filming 'I don't want to be part of those lies': Corrie's Jennie McAlpine slams previous reports of 'wishing' for gastric band surgery and refuses to be airbrushed 'I've tried to move past it': Love Island's Rachel Fenton reveals she's forgiven boyfriend Rykard Jenkins for sleeping with co-star Olivia Buckland 'You work hard but don't have much talent!' Eamonn Holmes makes constant digs at Ant & Dec on This Morning on the eve of Saturday Night Takeaway's return EXCLUSIVE: 'Things are about to get very exciting!': Sam Faiers 'set to sign a deal with top US TV network so she can expand her career globally' Lauren Pope flaunts her killer abs and ample cleavage in barely-there white lingerie... as provocatively posing in racy swimsuit Another steamy shot Lily-Rose Depp dazzles in waist-cinching sequin mini dress as she arrives ahead of the 42nd Cesar Awards in Paris Commanded attention Looking tasty in the Big Apple! Jesy Nelson quickly goes from drab to fab as she swaps baggy travel attire for ab-baring bralet hours after NYC arrival Emma Watson is the picture of elegance in a stomach-baring jumpsuit as she cosies up to co-star Dan Stevens at Beauty And The Beast photocall Now that's relaxed! Lady Gaga ditches her bra while enjoying domestic downtime with her new guy Christian Carino Quite revealing She's Stella-r! Maxwell showcases her model curves in figure-flaunting mesh dress for Versace AW17 Milan Fashion Week presentation 'It's a glorious day!' Grime star Stormzy is delighted after Adele wishes him 'good luck darling' and posts a picture of his new album on Instagram One cappuccino and a packet of crisps! Sheridan Smith steps out for refreshments as she takes a break between Funny Girl shows in Manchester Kendall Jenner flashes her toned stomach and figure beneath chunky athletic coat to storm the catwalk beside best pal Gigi Hadid in Versace's MFW show 'We f****d in the gym!' Kendra Wilkinson tweets explicit details about her sex life with husband Hank Have a boy aged seven and a girl who is two Frankie Essex flaunts her weight loss in leopard-print leggings as she works up a sweat during outdoor bootcamp workout Looking great! Pregnant Danielle Lloyd flaunts her curves in sizzling Gothic-inspired fashion shoot... after blocking ex Jamie O'Hara from seeing their sons Gun-toting Kimberley Garner looks every inch the screen siren in a skimpy silk negligee as she cosies up to male co-star while filming her Hollywood movie debut Holly Willoughby shares a sweet video of her son Chester, two, playing a game... after leaving BRITs after-party looking VERY bleary-eyed Silver starlet to golden girl! Gigi Hadid flashes her washboard stomach in crop top and metallic suit before a hasty outfit change into a striking orange ensemble 'I don't have time!' Paris Hilton strips off for sizzling shoot as she reveals why she turned her back on reality TV Found fame on The Simple Life Ex Emmerdale star Leah Bracknell appears frail just four months after revealing she has terminal cancer Appeared on Loose Women Lionel Richie 'postpones joint All The Hits tour with Mariah Carey as he recovers from knee surgery' Hello, is it knee you're looking for? 'Get a f***ing life!' Ian McShane slams Game Of Thrones fans for being too obsessed with the show and suggests they 'get out more' Here we go again! That will make jaws drop! Amy Schumer swims with sharks on girls' trip to Bahamas The hard-working comedienne is taking a well-deserved holiday Bella-issimo! Hadid teases at her ample cleavage in sizzling ombré dress during Versace's AW17 Milan Fashion Week show Funereal expression Amber Rose 'has been sued for over a million dollars by strip club Ace of Diamonds' after announcing she's purchased club...as it's revealed she has 'filed a trademark for the name' Linda Lusardi reveals she warned daughter Lucy Kane against fame... as she admits The Voice hopeful saw her glamour model shots aged just 7 The Hadid sisters, slogan tees, and a LOT of selfies: Behind the scenes images reveal what really goes on backstage at the Moschino show Perrie Edwards keeps a low profile in hooded jacket after THAT social media snap while Jesy Nelson rocks a sports luxe look... as Little Mix arrive in NYC Republican Caitlyn Jenner steps out after filming message criticizing Donald Trump over move to scrap transgender bathrooms Morning coffee in Malibu Get in the game! As Kendall Jenner and Bella Hadid continue to step out in sneakers, FEMAIL rounds up the seven pairs of affordable kicks that celebrities can't stop wearing No sibling rivalry here! Suki Waterhouse is pretty in pink as she's joined by sister Immy for fun and flirty fashion campaign Model genes Robin Thicke enjoys lunch date with younger girlfriend before court battle with ex Paula Patton kicks off in ugly war over son Showing them the ropes? Supermodel Naomi Campbell flaunts youthful complexion as she poses with white cords in bizarre Tod's MFW show Actress Thandie Newton ditches her usual glamour and goes for uber-casual ensemble as she heads to LA days before the Oscars So that's how she does it! Ireland Baldwin shows off toned midriff as she pulls yoga poses on exotic getaway Gave fans a look at her workout regime 'Eamonn, you are too FAT!' Viewers outraged with weight loss expert who brazenly insults This Morning presenter Holmes for being 'overweight' From Ridley Scott to diddly-squat: Nadia Sawalha reveals she turned down a role in epic movie Gladiator opposite Russell Crowe because she 'felt too fat' 'You gave me a booty call once!' David Walliams claims that Dannii Minogue approached him for late-night liaison after she brands him 'scary' 'They'll always have love': Jennifer Garner jets out of town as she and ex Ben Affleck move ahead with divorce Getting out of here Allison Williams shows off her new blonde locks and retro sense of style... after revealing she feels like she has 'broken up' with her Girls co-stars Walking on sunshine! Mandy Moore stuns in a yellow dress as she heads to talk show to chat about that 'epic' This Is Us episode Looked so summery Real Housewives star Vicki Gunvalson calls in police after 'employee steals thousands from her insurance brokerage' Gathered evidence 'It's unfair and it's not true!' Marnie Simpson hits back at claims cheating ex Lewis Bloor sponged £25k off her in lengthy Twitter rant Baby joy? Fans speculate whether pregnant Cheryl has ALREADY given birth to her first child with Liam Payne... after she unveiled her baby bump Make-up free Gwyneth Paltrow shows her flare for fashion in jeans and chic shirt while out in LA The busy 44-year-old actress showed off some 70s style Best hand-me-down EVER! Jenna Dewan Tatum reveals she saved the 2013 Oscars dress she wore while pregnant - so little Everly can one day wear it Twin time! Zoe Saldana enjoys an outing with her toddler sons after welcoming third child Zen The 38-year-old looked laid back She's the boss! Apprentice star Jessica Cunningham parades her endless pins in racy knee-high boots as she dons stylish corset top for London outing It's Co-LEAN Rooney! WAG shows off her curves in skintight snake-print leggings... as she posts sweet family snap from son's Christening No Gaff(e) here! Made In Chelsea's Frankie shows off A LOT of side-boob as she poses for racy topless snap in nothing but a pair of boxers So trenchy, so chic! Cate Blanchett, 47, cuts a stylish figure in a green plaid trench coat as she struts through New York City Effortlessly chic EXCLUSIVE: Kordell Stewart demands $4.5m from internet star who claimed they had a gay relationship while he was married to RHOA star Porsha Williams 'You pay your licence fee for the BBC!' GMB's Susanna Reid has sassy response after she's criticised for 'cringeworthy' Dab move on ITV TOWIE star Cara Kilbey's boyfriend is jailed for two years for having £116,000 of criminals' cash stashed in his daughter's bedroom Serial burglar accused of the £1 million raid at Simon Cowell's home could be 'incredibly unlucky' as court hears expert question DNA links to the scene 'I've never been to IN-N-OUT': Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson visits fast food joint for the first time ever during late night burger run He looked very pleased 'You vile creatures!' Cheeky Kim Woodburn, 74, judges infamous Porn Idol competition with mock-outrage as contestants pole-dance for her Cheery-looking Jamie O'Hara hits the town just hours after being blocked from seeing his sons as girlfriend stirs things up by hinting they'll have a baby Tell me about it, stud! Melanie Sykes channels Grease Lightning as she flaunts her killer body in leggings and a leather jacket for sassy photoshoot Lewis Hamilton shows off his flair for fashion in a scarlet coat and funky scarf as he leads the style pack at Emporio Armani show during Milan Fashion Week Designer Karl Lagerfeld calls out Meryl Streep for canceling a custom Oscars dress because Chanel refused to pay her - but she denies the claims Newly brunette Chantel Jeffries flashes her thighs in a pair of silver over-the-knee boots as she enjoys a night out in Hollywood Her worst week? Stand-in Lorraine host Helen Skelton makes a stream of on-air gaffes including mixing up guests' names and even alluding to her SEX LIFE Chums are getting back together! Ant and Dec in talks to reunite with Cat Deeley for 20th anniversary special of classic children's TV show SM:TV Perrie Edwards shares loved-up snap with boyfriend Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain after Little Mix's BRITs win... as fans go into meltdown over her maternal pose Making a splash! Busty Lisa Appleton flaunts the results of recent 3D lipo in a funky patterned bikini as she body-boards during Mexican getaway 'One chapter closes, another must open': Love Island's Terry Walsh reveals that he and Emma-Jane Woodham have split after eight months As stars prepare to hit the Oscars can YOU tell the red carpet dress costing just £39.99 from a bespoke designer gown worth at least £2,000? Kelly Brook shows off her enviable curves in skintight high-waisted jeans and a crisp white blouse as she steps out for lunch in LA Casual chic Anwar Hadid matches older sister Marielle's grunge look for family lunch... as their glam siblings Gigi and Bella strut their stuff at Milan fashion week Celeb glam squad reveal the three months of prep stars undergo to get Oscar-ready - from cryotherapy sessions to midnight visits to the dermatologist Khan't contain herself! CBB's Chloe struggles to cover up her ample assets in tiny towel as she shoots saucy Snapchat for fans Blooming marvellous! Prince Charles is in high spirits as he's presented with daffodils by smiling schoolchildren during a visit to a primary school Bella Thorne shows off her peachy posterior in throwback bikini snap from her holiday... after getting a chemical face peel Another racy pic Louis Tomlinson steps out in a hoodie and ripped jeans for meeting...amid rumours that he has reunited with ex-girlfriend Eleanor Calder Heart of class! Blondie star Debbie Harry, 71, looks sensational in thigh-high boots... as she teases a kiss with pal Pam Hogg for new magazine shoot What's so funny? Rachel Hunter, 47, cuddles up to GoT actor Joe Naufahu, 39, as the pair exchange laughs during low-key outing in New Zealand David Beckham leaves the gym with personal trainer Bobby Rich... after the minder led Brooklyn home after a BRITs party 'We've not had closure': Wham!'s Andrew Ridgeley reveals his heartache over the delay in burying his late friend George Michael Tamara Ecclestone shows off her hourglass figure and ample cleavage in a peach bikini as she cradles daughter Sophia on Bahamas break SPOILER ALERT: Steve is left holding Leanne's baby in Coronation Street... but will this be the moment Michelle finds out he's the father? Pierce Brosnan looks smitten with wife of sixteen years as they step out arm in arm for lunch Doting husband 'First time I've giggled in days': Marnie Simpson, 25, thanks pal Kim Woodburn, 74, for 'fixing things' after she discovered Lewis Bloor cheated on her Emma Watson oozes understated elegance in a fitted cream tulip dress as she attends Beauty and the Beast afterparty Always stylish Emma Watson wears fairytale blue gown complete with train as she looks into the eyes of her handsome co-star Dan Stevens at Beauty And The Beast launch Is the Queen taking fashion tips from KATE? How the monarch has been stepping out in ensembles that could have been chosen by the Duchess herself Bring back Angela! Katie Price films a passionate kissing scene for upcoming movie Sharknado 5: Earth O... as she joins the cast of Tara Reid and Jedward 'Human Ken Doll' Rodrigo Alves to enter the record books after undergoing his 51st cosmetic surgery to get 'baby skin' (as he insists he's not addicted) The Fast and Fabulous! Lottie Moss flaunts her legs in a minuscule velvet dress as she parties at Bvlgari's Milan Fashion Week bash Furry stylish! Princess Eugenie stays warm in a fur-lined parka as she steps out in London's West End Storm Doris didn't stop the young royal Emma Roberts puts on a busty display in a quirky ruched dress as she parties at eco-friendly pre-Oscar event The 25-year-old star was looking lovely Sleek Sharon Stone, 58, looks youthful as ever as she steps out in a chic ensemble for dinner in Beverly Hills She's as busy as she's ever been Scott Eastwood chats to his apparent stunt double as pictures of MASSIVE flames and gun-wielding tanks emerge from the set of Pacific Rim: Uprising That's shoe-business! Gigi Hadid STUMBLES as her heel gets caught in her beautiful thigh-split dress on the runway at the Moschino MFW show Young mother says married EastEnders star Danny Dyer sent her pictures of his manhood in a series of lewd messages amid reports of a meltdown 'She was very keen to get to know him': Ashley Roberts, 35, 'cosied up' to Brooklyn Beckham, 17, at the BRITs despite being double his age Got chatting Ashley James exudes 90's glamour as she parades her endless legs in shimmering metallic mini-skirt during girls' night out Bianca Gascoigne shows off her figure in a skimpy gold sequin bikini... as former flame Jamie O'Hara prepares to battle it out in court with ex Danielle Lloyd Suddenly shy? Forster's TV adaptation 'I'm literally dying': Katy Perry admits she got sick and ended up in the bathroom at her first ever BRIT Awards back in 2009 Peek-a-boob! Kim Kardashian suffers wardrobe malfunction as she flashes a hint of nipple in plunging corset top Beyonce pulls out of Coachella under advice from doctors after announcing she's pregnant with twins... but promises to perform next year Now that's an overrated wax figure! From La La Land to Lion, our critic picks his likely winners and unlucky losers for Sunday night and the list might surprise you 'La La with Luna': John Legend rehearses for the Oscars with baby daughter as Chrissy Teigen goofs around on Snapchat Had a bit of company 'I went fully gray at 18!': Eva Longoria, 41, reveals she's been dyeing her locks since she was a teenager Started going grey at an early age Sheer beauty! Kourtney Kardashian dons corset-style top with see through panels after filming KUWTK in LA Busy day of shooting Kim Kardashian Snapchats soul food cooking session... after stressing over losing 7lbs Served up an absolute feast Kendall Jenner wears a cardboard box for a hat as she storms the runway with sisters Gigi and Bella Hadid for Moschino's AW17 Milan Fashion Week Show Who's the momager now?
